Class TextArea

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.ecs.GenericElement
        |
        +--org.apache.ecs.ElementAttributes

                          |
                          +--org.apache.ecs.html.TextArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attributes, java.lang.Cloneable, Element, ElementRegistry, FocusEvents, FormEvents, KeyEvents, MouseEvents, PageEvents, java.io.Serializable
public class TextArea
extends MultiPartElement
implements PageEvents, FormEvents, MouseEvents, KeyEvents, FocusEvents

This class creates a <TEXTAREA></TEXTAREA> tag.

Version:
$Id: TextArea.java,v 1.7 2003/04/27 09:03:39 rdonkin Exp $
Author:
Stephan Nagy, Jon S. Stevens
See Also:

setOnChange

public void setOnChange(java.lang.String script)
The onchange event occurs when a control loses the input focus and its value has been modified since gaining focus. This attribute applies to the following elements: INPUT, SELECT, and TEXTAREA.

setOnChange in interface FormEvents
